board.name: scu200_es
board.display_name: Spartan Ultrascale+ SCU200 ES Evaluation Platform
board.description: Spartan Ultrascale+ SCU200 ES Evaluation Platform

component.name: part0
component.display_name: Spartan Ultrascale+ SCU200 ES Evaluation Platform

interface.name: ddr4_sdram
interface.description: DDR4 board interface, it can use DDR4 IP for connection.

interface.name: lpddr5_sdram
interface.description: lpddr5_sdram board interface, it can use LPDDRMC5 IP for connection.

component.name: lpddr5_sdram
component.description: 512Mb x 32 (512Mbx16 x1Die x2 CH x 1R) lpddr5 memory

component.name: default_sysclk1_300
component.description: 1.8V LVDS differential 300 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: default_sysclk1_320
component.description: 1.8V LVDS differential 320 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: sys_diff_clock
component.description: 1.8V LVDS differential 200 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: emc_clk_150
component.description: 3.3V LVDS SI570 programmable oscillator used as non-differential clock on the board

component.name: reset
component.description: CPU Reset Push Button, Active High

component.name: push_buttons_5bits
component.description: Push Buttons, C W E S N, Active High

component.name: uartb
component.description: USB-to-UART Bridge, which allows a connection to a host computer with a USB port

component.name: uartc
component.description: USB-to-UART Bridge, which allows a connection to a host computer with a USB port

component.name: uart0
component.description: USB-to-UART Bridge, which allows a connection to a host computer with a USB port
